title: He Claims He's Celibate...But His Actions Show Otherwise
description:
You're dating a guy who is open about being celibate. However, everything you two hang out, he becomes touchy feely. You're confused by his signals, and don't what to do.
You wants to support his journey but he's making it hard. Is it your responsibility to reinforce his boundary? 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
